content: आचरित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Done, observed, practised, as a rite or usage &c. {@--2@} Usual, customary. {@--3@} Enjoined, fixed by rule. --तं {@--1@} Conduct, behaviour. {@--2@} One of the five means of recovering or paying back debt; <ls>Ms. 8. 49</ls>; see also Bṛhaspati quoted by <ls>Kull.</ls>
